manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The best tripod is the one that's with you Funded on Kickstarter in 2013, featured on Tech Crunch, Gizmodo, and more. The Pocket Tripod PRO is a patented 'tripod' that fits in a wallet, so that it's always with you when you need it. Capture the moment hands-free so you can be in the moment too.
Seriously Tough We tested the Pocket Tripod PRO to find out how durable it really is

Time-Lapse Holds your phone at the same angle for hours Nothing is better at making your travel video pop than an epic time-lapse. Whether you capture a sequence of stills, or use the native Time-Lapse app, you need a way to keep your camera steady for a long time. The Pocket Tripod PRO is perfect for when you don't have a big camera or tripod with you, but just can't miss the chance to capture the moment. Photography Props your phone anywhere The best tripod is the one that's with you. You don't have to ask strangers for pictures anymore or carry an awkward selfie stick. Take candid-style selfies with your Pocket Tripod PRO. Long Exposure Stabilizes your phone Light Painting is one of the coolest things you can do with a tripod. Leave the shutter open to capture light streaks. You can even use this technique to amplify the details in low-light scenes. Video Calls Centre Stage ready All play and no work? Do hands-free Zoom calls for work and school without being glued to a laptop. Or get TikTok famous and quit your job. Either way you need a Pocket Tripod PRO.

Card Size Fits in any wallet A Pocket Tripod for your pocket camera. Taking the space of only two stacked credit cards, the Pocket Tripod PRO discreetly fits in any wallet or purse. So it's always with you when you need it. Soft Contact Grips securely Soft contact points securely grip on to your device, making it safe for delicate cases and screen protectors. Carbon Fiber Enhances Stability Real carbon fiber is CNC cut to form the legs of the Pocket Tripod PRO. This gives it enhanced rigidity to hold the weight of your phone without sacrificing flexibility for comfort in your wallet. Angle Indicator Convenience and Precision Provides a precise reference for pointing to key angles. 5° minor and 15° major divisions. Grey Fit Card Calibrates White Balance and Measure Included with every package is a Grey Fit Card. This useful wallet-size tool can help you calibrate your camera's White Balance. The openings all around it function as a millimeter pocket caliper and can be used to measure the thickness of your device.

Fluid Tilt Exact Angle Adjustment Adapters connect to the carbon fiber legs via precise radial rails. These rails rotate fluidly to keep your mobile device steady at any set tilt angle. Interchangeable Adapters Future-Proof Adapters can be swapped to provide a snug fit with any phone or case. The openings on the Adapters match the thickness of your phone. The Universal Kit includes 9 of the most common sizes (8.0 MM and 9.0 MM to 12.5 MM). Universal Fit Compatible With All Phones and Cases* The openings on the Adapters follow the cross-section profile of most phones and cases. This universal design only needs to match the thickness of your device from screen to back for compatibility. By swapping to the matching size, you can keep your Pocket Tripod PRO compatible with your latest phone and case. *Maximum combined thickness = 12.5 mm (1/2 inch)

Are the legs made of real carbon fiber, or is it just cosmetic? The legs have actual carbon fiber embedded in them. Specifically 3K Twill carbon fiber, precision CNC'd and overmolded with plastic to enable it to snap into position when transforming from card to tripod and back. I have an Android/iPhone/Case on my phone. Is the Pocket Tripod PRO compatible with my phone? Yes, the Pocket Tripod PRO is universal. Pick an Adapter from the included kit that has the same opening as the thickness of your device. Adapter 12.5MM is the largest size for a maximum combines thickness (case and phone) of 12.5 mm (1/2 inch). What if I upgrade my phone or change its case? Do I need to buy a new Pocket Tripod PRO? No, just swap the Adapters, which range between 6.0 mm (1/4 inch) and 12.5 mm (1/2 inch). How durable is the Pocket Tripod PRO? Should I be worried about parts wearing down or breaking? The material (PC-ABS) is practically unbreakable, normally used for power tools. Well-designed hinges can withstand thousands of cycles. If you've received one that was defective, contact our support team with your order number for a free replacement Do I need a special wallet to carry my Pocket Tripod PRO? No, any wallet that is design to hold standard credit cards is ideal. Keep in mind that the Pocket Tripod PRO is 2.29 mm (0.090 inch) thick. So it takes exactly the same space as two embossed credit cards stacked on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my wallet so I could always be able to put my phone down to take pictures. I am so happy with it! Very easy to use, comes in beautiful packaging and very clear and easy instructions. Lays down flat inside my wallet like a credit card. I would highly reccomend 100%I have even changed phones since my purchase and was able to change the insert so I can still use it.
